thread.title_full: I'll stay here again next time! - Review of Hilton Garden Inn New York - Times Square Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rebecca E
title: I'll stay here again next time! - Review
text: The hotel is extremely well located, Staff was helpful. The room small but laid out well and clean. Updated. Only minor criticism would be the elevators. Right on Time Square and near the subway. I'll stay here again!
